Projects

VidBid

An Online Video Bidding Platform

I did this project in my 4th Sem of MCA. It is basically an online platform for video bidding.The front end was designed with HTML 5 and CSS 3. For the Backend Part, PHP was used .

Pharmacy Management System

A complete database integrated management system for pharmacy

In this project ,I designed a Pharmacy Management System that would be used to manage a pharmacy store.It would enable the user to store,add,retreive and delete items conveniently. It is almosty a perfect imitation of a sample pharmacy store.

Covid 19 Tracker

Made Using Python.

In this particular project, I made a live tracker for tracking the deatails fregarding the Covid-19 Virus that wreaked havoc in 2020.
